If two representable values are equally close, the result is the value with more trailing zeros in its significand bit pattern.

# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new value, rounded to the closest possible representation.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ v: Int)
```

## Discussion

If two representable values are equally close, the result is the value with more trailing zeros in its significand bit pattern.
title: init(_:)
